revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

[[Category:Player vs Monster‏‎]][[Category:Player vs Player]][[Category:Player vs Player]] __TOC__
[[Image:Flag_wrestling.gif]] ==Description== Characters with 80 or higher in both [[Wrestling]] and [[Anatomy]] can attempt to Stun their opponents. A successful Stun punch will paralyze a target for 4 seconds. This stun punch has the same effects as the paralyze blow for [[Special_Moves#Fencing|Fencing Special Move]]. It's often coupled with [[Magery]] and the combination of [[Evaluate_Intelligence|Evaluating Intelligence]] and [[Anatomy]] provides the passive [[Evaluate_Intelligence#Defensive_Ability|Defensive Wrestling]] ability. Player Templates with [[Animal_Taming|Animal Taming]] cannot perform Stunning Blows. ==Usage== *To perform one of these special attacks, players will need to set a macro to put themselves in the appropriate wrestling “mode”. *Both hands must be free in order to perform a move. *Once in the special attack mode, the character will attempt the maneuver with each successful hit. *If a maneuver is performed successfully the wrestler will automatically go out of their wrestling mode. There is a 10 second delay before the wrestler can perform stun. *While in a wrestling mode, each attempt to perform a maneuver (each hit or miss) will result in a loss of stamina. Special Moves can be accessed through your client assistance program by setting a hotkey for that skill, or through the client itself through Settings > Macros > New macro > Add: [[File:Special_Moves_Stun_Disarm_Macro_Preview.PNG]] ==See Also== *[[Animal_Taming|Animal Taming]] *[[Anatomy]] *[[Disarm]] *[[Evaluate_Intelligence|Evaluating Intelligence]] *[[Magery]] *[[Special Moves]] *[[Wrestling]] =Contributors= The community would like to thank the following brave adventurers who contributed their time and experiences for others to enjoy: * Tahuk
